googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRulesCombined: Any North Dakota resident can request an absentee ballot and vote by mail.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: North Dakota does not have voter registration.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: North Dakota doesn't have voter registration.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.registrationRules:
North Dakota does not have voter registration, but to be eligible to vote you
must:

  * be a citizen of the United States
  * be at least 18 years old by Election Day
  * be a resident of North Dakota
  * reside in the precinct for 30 days preceding Election Day
  * be able to provide a drivers license, non-driver identification card or other approved form of identification
  * not be currently incarcerated for a felony conviction.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.newsItemsMd: * [ElectProject's count of current votes in North Dakota](https://electproject.github.io/Early-Vote-2020G/ND.html)
